info.name: PAWS360 Admin API
info.description:
Complete API collection for PAWS360 unified student success platform. Includes authentication, student management, analytics, course administration, alert management, and system administration endpoints.

## Features
- SAML2 Authentication with Azure AD
- Role-based access control (RBAC)
- FERPA compliance for student data
- Comprehensive analytics and reporting
- Real-time alert management
- Bulk operations support
- Audit logging

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT Bearer token authentication. Start with the SAML2 login flow in the Authentication folder.

## Environment Setup
Set these variables in your Postman environment:
- `base_url`: API base URL (e.g., http://localhost:8080)
- `jwt_token`: JWT token from authentication
- `student_id`: Test student ID
- `course_id`: Test course ID
- `alert_id`: Test alert ID

## Quick Start
1. Run 'Login via SAML2' request
2. Set jwt_token variable from response
3. Test other endpoints with proper permissions

request.description: Initiate SAML2 authentication flow with Azure AD. This redirects to Microsoft login page.

urlencoded.description: Base64 encoded SAML assertion from Azure AD

request.description: Handle SAML2 callback from Azure AD and establish session

exec: console.log('‚úÖ Authentication successful - JWT token set');

request.description: Retrieve current user session information and permissions
Refresh JWT token before expiration

item.name: üë§ Student Data
item.description: Student profile, dashboard, and academic information

request.description: Get authenticated student's profile information
Get comprehensive student dashboard with enrollments, grades, and alerts
Get student grades with detailed assignment breakdown
Get current and historical course enrollments
Get current term class schedule with meeting times
Get alerts relevant to current user
